thread.section_title: Capo d'Africa Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Fantastic Hotel
thread.title_full: Fantastic Hotel - Review of Capo d'Africa Hotel, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: sphardcastle2017
title: Fantastic Hotel
text: Stayed here for 3 nights for our first trip to Rome. The hotel is amazing! Friendly and courteous staff, clean and spacious rooms and the breakfast on the terrace is a great way to start the day exploring. Would highly recommend eating in a local trattoria near to the hotel for authentic Italian food. The location is perfect for exploring Rome, 5 minutes walk to the colosseum. Would definitely stay here again!!
